Package com.continuuity.weave.zookeeper

This package provides functionality for ZooKeeper interactions.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
NodeChildren Represents result of call to ZKClient.getChildren(String, org.apache.zookeeper.Watcher) method.
NodeData Represents result of call to ZKClient.getData(String, org.apache.zookeeper.Watcher).
OperationFuture<V> A ListenableFuture that also provides the requested path for a operation.
RetryStrategy Provides strategy to use for operation retries.
ZKClient A ZooKeeper client that provides asynchronous zookeeper operations.
ZKClientService A ZKClient that extends from Service to provide lifecycle management functions.
ZKOperations.Callback<T> Represents a ZK operation updates callback.
ZKOperations.ChildrenCallback Interface for defining callback method to receive children nodes updates.
ZKOperations.DataCallback Interface for defining callback method to receive node data updates.
 

Class Summary
ForwardingZKClient  
ForwardingZKClientService  
RetryStrategies Factory for creating common RetryStrategy implementation.
ZKClients  
ZKClientService.Builder Builder for creating an implementation of ZKClientService.
ZKClientServices Provides static factory method to create ZKClientService with modified behaviors.
ZKOperations Collection of helper methods for common operations that usually needed when interacting with ZooKeeper.
 

Enum Summary
RetryStrategy.OperationType Defines ZooKeeper operation type that triggers retry.
 

Package com.continuuity.weave.zookeeper Description

This package provides functionality for ZooKeeper interactions.
